import { useState } from 'react' import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import NightModeToggle from './NightModeToggle' import { Logo } from './styles/components.styles' const Header = () => { const theme = useSelector((state) => state.themeToggle.theme) const [mode, setMode] = useState(theme) return (
Herolo-WeatherApp
Home{' '} Favorites
) } export default Header
